1.2.3. moha.modelsystem.modeloperator¶

Classes

ModelHamiltonian(lattice, site[, pbc]) Base class for the Physical Model Hamiltonians: 1-D Hubbard, PPP, Ising, etc.
OneBodyTerm(terms, cell1, site1, cell2, …) Operator for one body interaction
TwoBodyTerm(terms, cell1, site1, cell2, …) Operator for two body interaction
class moha.modelsystem.modeloperator.ModelHamiltonian(lattice, site, pbc=True)[source]¶

Base class for the Physical Model Hamiltonians: 1-D Hubbard, PPP, Ising, etc.

add_operator(operator)[source]¶

Add operator to the model Hamiltonian.

compute_operator(operator)[source]¶

Calculate the one-body term of the model Hamiltonian.

compute_overlap()[source]¶

Calculate overlap of the model Hamiltonian, (identity matrix).

nbasis¶

The number of sites.

pbc¶

The periodic boundary condition.

class moha.modelsystem.modeloperator.OneBodyTerm(terms, cell1, site1, cell2, site2, parameter)[source]¶

Operator for one body interaction

class moha.modelsystem.modeloperator.TwoBodyTerm(terms, cell1, site1, cell2, site2, parameter)[source]¶

Operator for two body interaction
